name: Creature Consorts
description:
Maggie is a young witch who receives a mysterious letter calling her to Langsdon, a mystical town known for being home to all sorts of beautiful beasties, sightly specters, and horror hotties!

 Follow her as she meets a cast of spooky babes to befriend, and maybe more!

Suzy [Apparent Age: 21]

A Bubbly vampire with her finger on the pulse of good music, and a healthy thirst for turning a profit

Madeline [Apparent Age: 35]

A homebody of a werewolf who prefers a nice cup of coffee and a walk in the park over a crowded restaurant any day

Coco [Apparent Age: 28]

A reserved receptionist who prefers her privacy

Nile [Apparent Age: 30]

A mummy therapist with a very big heart and surprisingly good skin (what's her secret??)

Pat [Apparent Age: 27]

A no-nonsense personal body guard, she's actually pretty chill once you get to know her

SWB Media

Written & Directed by Turtletower

Sprite Art by Crema / Carrd

Graphic Design by Pedro "Alfie" Puente / Instagram / Behance

Music & Programming by Splashbun / Twitter
